goals__remit: Independent quarry, recycling and waste business that needs to make profit but has a very responsible outlook on being a good neighbour with a need to ensure our activities are in balance with all our stakeholders. We have a contract with Norfolk County Council to handle and process export their residual waste to RDF and export under TFS for reuse in Dutch & German EfW plants as a fuel.
